title: Web Scraper & Content Indexing
description: Scrape web content and index it for intelligent querying and retrieval

scrape_and_index.title: Scrape & Index Content
scrape_and_index.description: Scrape content from web URLs and index it into a searchable vector store for later retrieval. Supports multiple URLs, customizable chunking, and persistent storage.

query_indexed_content.title: Query Indexed Content
query_indexed_content.description: Search and retrieve relevant information from previously indexed web content using semantic similarity. Perfect for answering questions based on scraped documents.

website_indexer.title: Complete Website Indexer
website_indexer.description: Index entire websites by discovering and scraping all pages using sitemaps. Automatically finds sitemaps from robots.txt, extracts all URLs, and comprehensively indexes website content.

document_indexer.title: Document Content Indexer
document_indexer.description: Import and index document content directly to the vector database. Perfect for adding content from Google Docs, Notion pages, PDFs, or any other document sources by copy-pasting.

states.description: Configure the availability of each web scraper skill (disabled, public, or private)

max_urls_per_request.title: Max URLs per Request
max_urls_per_request.description: Maximum number of URLs that can be scraped in a single request

default_chunk_size.title: Default Chunk Size
default_chunk_size.description: Default size of text chunks for document indexing (characters)

default_chunk_overlap.title: Default Chunk Overlap
default_chunk_overlap.description: Default overlap between chunks to maintain context (characters)

requests_per_second.title: Requests per Second
requests_per_second.description: Rate limit for web scraping to be respectful to target servers

request_timeout.title: Request Timeout
request_timeout.description: Timeout for web requests in seconds

api_key_provider.title: API Key Provider
api_key_provider.description: Who provides the API key for embeddings
